devdoc.details: This contract provides useful helper functions for `Mixologist`.

params._withdraw: if true, withdraws from YieldBox to `msg.sender`

depositAddCollateralAndBorrow(address,ui.notice: deposts collateral to YieldBox, adds collateral to Mixologist, borrows and can withdraw to personal address

depositAndAddAsset(address,uint256).notice: deposits asset to YieldBox and lends it to Mixologist

depositAndRepay(address,uint256,uint256).notice: deposits to YieldBox and repays borrowed amount
